messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

location error production oracle location error production hello issue officer

message.reasoning:

I'm weighing whether it relates to "Storage" or possibly "Access". I am also considering "Miscellaneous" as a catch-all if those initial thoughts don't fully fit.
